content: make your baby the coolest kid in town with this simple ombre baby hat this is a baby version of adult hat ombre with a twist /patterns/library/ombre-with-a-twist unlike the adult version there are no long floats so ladderback jackard or carrying floats is not required if you knit this hat and post as project i ll send you the adult hat for free one size hat is made 30cm circumference to fit baby hat is made with fingering yarn a dark 15g / 53m / 57yds b light 15g / 53m / 57yds 2 5mm us 1 5 and 3 0mm us 2 5 needles required
